title: A Messy Conversation
content: Today I had the great pleasure of being interviewed for Get Messy Art Journal by one of my favourite Messy Artists, the fabulous Misty Granade.  We talked about my creative story so far, the things that inspire me to create, how there's no such thing as a beginner, and a whole lot more.  Here is the replay of the interview for you to enjoy!  https://youtu.be/CuC3puPQufg
